name: pretty-pr-link
title: Pretty PR Link
description: Quickly copy the link of a GitHub Pull Request in a formatted way so you can share with your team and ask for reviews.
author: jopcmelo

preferences.name: nonUrgentPrefix
preferences.title: Non Urgent Prefix
preferences.description: The prefix to use when copying a non urgent pull request link

preferences.name: urgentPrefix
preferences.title: Urgent Prefix
preferences.description: The prefix to use when copying a urgent pull request link

commands.name: copy-formatted-link
commands.title: Copy Formatted Link
commands.description: Copy the formatted link without urgency indicator

commands.name: copy-formatted-urgent-link
commands.title: Copy Formatted Urgent Link
commands.description: Copy the formatted link with urgency indicator

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
